evidence.claim: Johnson & Johnson utilizes AWS for cloud services.
They have invested in FHIR and HL7 standards for interoperability.
Integration patterns indicate use of EDI protocols and X12 standards for transaction processing.
Detailed cloud infrastructure and data management are highlighted in their developer documentation.
They comply with HIPAA regulations, confirming data privacy and security measures.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of X12 transactions or API automation alignment found.
